title: Understanding the Importance of Empathy
text: Empathy allows nurses to connect with patients on a personal level, making them feel understood and supported.

title: The Role of Validation
text: Validation involves acknowledging the patient's feelings and experiences, which can help in reducing their aggression.

title: Nonjudgmental Attitudes
text: Approaching patients without judgment helps in building trust and encourages open communication.

hintAnswer: empathy, validation, and nonjudgmental attitudes, which can help defuse tension and foster a therapeutic relationship
title: Choosing the Right Attitude
text: Which of the following attitudes should nurses adopt in aggressive situations?
choices: empathy, validation, and nonjudgmental attitudes, which can help defuse tension and foster a therapeutic relationship
judgmental and $$research-oriented$$ attitudes, which can help with diagnosis and control
